name: SocialShare
short_description:
It is a social network with decentralized storage of data.  By saying decentralized, we mean that data will be stored locally (user side).
To do that, we’ll use NAS 
Thanks to this decentralized system, users will be able to freely exchange information (video, music, ...)
The interface will be a website. Moreover, there will be a server which will communicate with all of the NAS so that it can know all of the NAS addresses and then transmit data.

What our project brings:
Our project can bring answers to several problems 

- With existing technologies (Cloud …), we don’t know where our data are.

- A possible use of our data by a third party

- Democratization of NAS for general public incorporating a social network 

-Free flow of information without control



   - Programming languages : PHP / MySQL (web interface), Java (tree display on the web interface) 

  - Equipment :2 virtual machines (representing 2 NAS) 
- Nas OS: Ubuntu
summary: Social network with decentralized storage using NAS
